hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
SRC=$WORKSPACE/src
# Setup configuration for robot job ZIP_SRC=$(ls openmicroscopy*zip) unzip $ZIP_SRC rm -f $ZIP_SRC mv $WORKSPACE/${ZIP_SRC%.zip} $SRC
ZIP_DIST=$(ls OMERO.server*.zip) unzip $ZIP_DIST rm -f $ZIP_DIST mv $WORKSPACE/${ZIP_DIST%.zip} $SRC/dist
source $HOME/omero-virtualenv/bin/activate
pip install --upgrade --no-deps --force-reinstall -r $SRC/dist/share/web/requirements-py27-nginx.txt
$SRC/dist/bin/omero config set omero.web.prefix "/web"
cd $SRC/dist bash ../components/tests/ui/robot_setup.sh mv $SRC/dist/robot_ice.config $SRC/components/tests/ui/resources/ export ICE_CONFIG=$SRC/components/tests/ui/resources/robot_ice.config $SRC/dist/bin/omero --path $SRC/components/tests/ui/plugins robot config --protocol http --webhost 'develop-nginx.docker.openmicroscopy.org' --remoteurl 'http://seleniumhub:4444/wd/hub' --dc 'browserName:${BROWSER},javascriptEnabled:True' > $SRC/components/tests/ui/resources/config.txt
echo Running the UI tests export JAVA_OPTS="-d32"
#$SRC/build.py -f components/tests/ui/build.xml -Dtest.with.fail=false ui-test-web $SRC/build.py -f components/tests/ui/build.xml web-chrome -Dtest.with.fail=false $SRC/build.py -f components/tests/ui/build.xml web-firefox -Dtest.with.fail=false
#aggregate the various output files. $SRC/build.py -f components/tests/ui/build.xml aggregate-results
